summary: New follower added to game. Built like a beast and fights like a monster! Follows your ever command and will give his life for your cause. great companion to have along!
descriptionHtml:
Balruck is know as the leader of the bears because of his bear armor and sheer size. This beast fights with a battle axe like its a toothpick and will crush any opponent that stands in his path. His size and strength makes him unreplaceable in battle! He will save our life more than once. being a leader Balruck has learned the basics of magic and although prefers to fight with brute force, he is able to heal himself in battle.

You can find and recruit Balruck to your fighting force outside the gates of the Palace of the Kings.

No problems yet reported feel free to share any bugs so they can be fixed and updated!!!
author: Gthwlb
